More power!

> Did the page just get 7 sec load time?

Do you know how fast the Hype Train is travelling? That's how long it takes for signals from Earth to reach us.

To better show how far the game has come, let's all watch the first promo video squad made about the game:

[http://youtu.be/l5OhFnq_iKw](https://youtu.be/l5OhFnq_iKw)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bchnEcKaOKA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

The HYPE TRAIN is made of physics-less parts! It can go faster!

> 
> The HYPE TRAIN is made of physics-less parts! It can go faster!

Negative mass isn't enough!

We need...

Complex mass.

lol, I just got a call from work. Everyone except for the manager and director in my department called in sick today. My boss left me a message on my phone asking me to come in (it's my day off, I'm not going in). Me and the other 5 guys in the department are all big Kerbal players. I doubt they are sick... they are here... somewhere in the cars of they hype train. I should call them all and see if they want to have a launch party; I hear that booze, rocketry and general unprofessionalism go together pretty good.
